entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as one of the characters who heard the scream and went back to the girls' toilets. He is described as being pale, like the Bloody Baron.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as one of the characters who heard the scream and went back to the girls' toilets. He is described as gasping in shock when he realizes it's the girls' toilets.

entities.name: hermione granger
entities.description: Hermione Granger is mentioned as being in the girls' toilets, shrinking against the wall and looking like she's about to faint. She is the target of the troll.

entities.name: the bloody baron
entities.description: The Bloody Baron is mentioned as a comparison for Ron's pale complexion.

entities.name: the troll
entities.description: The troll is described as advancing on Hermione, knocking sinks off the walls and having mean little eyes. It is confused by Harry throwing a tap against the wall.

relationships.description: The troll hesitates and then makes for Harry after being confused by the noise he made with the tap.
The troll is advancing on Hermione, knocking sinks off the walls as it goes.
